<script setup>
import {ref, onMounted} from 'vue';
import eventbus from '@/eventbus/eventbus';

const buttonData = ref({type: '', filter: ''});
const showButton = ref(false);

const updateButtonData = (type, filter) => {
  buttonData.value.type = type;
  buttonData.value.filter = filter;
  showButton.value = type !== '' && filter !== ''; // type과 filter가 빈 문자열이 아닐 때만 버튼을 보여줌
};

// 이벤트 리스너 등록
onMounted(() => {
  eventbus.SearchResultEvent.add('filterUpdate', updateButtonData);
});
</script>

<template>
  <button v-if="showButton" class="btn filterBtn">
    {{ buttonData.type }}: {{ buttonData.filter }}
  </button>
  <button v-if="showButton" class="btn filterBtn">
    {{ buttonData.type }}: {{ buttonData.filter }}
  </button>
</template>

<style scoped>
.filterBtn {
  background-color: white;
  border-radius: 20px;
  width: 70px;
  border: 1px solid #b4c7dd;
}
</style>
